00055 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 /** @defgroup SPI_FLASH_Exported_Constants SPI FLASH exported constants
00057   * @{
00058   */
00059 #define SPI_FLASH_PAGESIZE              256
00060 #define SPI_FLASH_SECTOR_SIZE           (1024 * 4)
00061 
00062 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_WRITE             0x02  /*!< Program the selected page instruction                    */
00063 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_WRSR              0x01  /*!< Write Status Register instruction                        */
00064 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_WREN              0x06  /*!< Write enable instruction                                 */
00065 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_WRDI              0x04  /*!< Write disable instruction                                */
00066 #ifdef HT_QSPI
00067 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_4PP               0x38  /*!< Quad input to program the selected page instruction      */
00068 #endif
00069 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_READ              0x03  /*!< Read Data instruction                                    */
00070 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_FREAD             0x0B  /*!< Read Data at high speed instruction                      */
00071 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_DREAD             0x3B  /*!< Dual Output Mode Read instruction                        */
00072 #ifdef HT_QSPI
00073 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_QREAD             0x6B  /*!< Quad Output Mode Read instruction                        */
00074 #endif
00075 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_RDSR              0x05  /*!< Read Status Register instruction                         */
00076 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_RDID              0x9F  /*!< Read JEDEC ID instruction                                */
00077 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_REMS              0x90  /*!< Read electronic manufacturer & device ID instruction     */
00078 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_SE                0x20  /*!< Sector Erase instruction                                 */
00079 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_BE                0x52  /*!< Block Erase instruction                                  */
00080 #define SPI_FLASH_CMD_CE                0x60  /*!< Chip Erase instruction                                   */
00081 
00082 #define SPI_FLASH_BUSY_FLAG             0x01  /*!< Write operation in progress                              */
00083 
00084 #define SPI_FLASH_DUMMY_BYTE            0x00
00085 
00086 #define MX25L1606E_FLASH_JEDEC_ID       0xC22015
00087 /**
00088   * @}
00089   */
00090 
00091 /* Exported macro ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00092 /** @defgroup SPI_FLASH_Exported_Macros SPI FLASH exported macros
00093   * @{
00094   */
00095 #define SPI_FLASH_SEL_ACTIVE()      GPIO_ClearOutBits(GPIO_PORT[FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_PIN)
00096 #define SPI_FLASH_SEL_INACTIVE()    GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], FLASH_SPI_SEL_GPIO_PIN)
00097 /**
00098   * @}
00099   */
00100 
00101 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00102 /** @defgroup SPI_FLASH_Exported_Type SPI FLASH exported types
00103   * @{
00104   */
00105 typedef void (*pWriteFunction)(u8*, u32, u32);
00106 /**
00107   * @}
00108   */

00112 /** @defgroup SPI_FLASH_Exported_Functions SPI FLASH exported functions
00113   * @{
00114   */
00115 u32 SPI_FLASH_Init(void);
00116 u32 SPI_FLASH_ReadJEDECID(void);
00117 void SPI_FLASH_ChipErase(void);
00118 void SPI_FLASH_SectorErase(u32 SectorAddr);
00119 void SPI_FLASH_BlockErase(u32 BlockAddr);
00120 void SPI_FLASH_PageWrite(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte);
00121 void SPI_FLASH_BufferRead(u8* ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte);
00122 #if (!LIBCFG_SPI_NO_DUAL)
00123 void SPI_FLASH_BufferDualRead(u16* ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte);
00124 #endif
00125 
00126 #ifdef HT_PDMA
00127 void SPI_FLASH_PageWriteByDMA(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte);
00128 void SPI_FLASH_BufferReadByDMA(u8* ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte);
00129 void SPI_FLASH_BufferDualReadByDMA(u16* ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte);
00130 #endif
00131 
00132 void SPI_FLASH_WriteStatus(u32 Value);
00133 u16 SPI_FLASH_SendByte(u8 byte);
00134 void SPI_FLASH_WriteEnable(void);
00135 void SPI_FLASH_WriteDisable(void);
00136 u8 SPI_FLASH_WaitForWriteEnd(void);
00137 void SPI_FLASH_BufferWriteBy(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte, pWriteFunction pSPI_FKASG_PageWriteFun);
00138 
00139 #ifdef HT_QSPI
00140 u8 SPI_FLASH_WriteStatus2(u8 Status_Value, u8 Configuration_Value);
00141 void QSPI_FLASH_QuadPageWrite(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte);
00142 void QSPI_FLASH_BufferQuadRead(u16* ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte);
00143 #ifdef HT_PDMA
00144 void QSPI_FLASH_QuadPageWriteByDMA(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte);
00145 void QSPI_FLASH_BufferQuadReadByDMA(u16* ReadBuffer, u32 ReadAddr, u32 NumOfReadByte);
00146 #endif
00147 #endif
00148 
00149 #ifdef HT_QSPI
00150 #define QSPI_FLASH_BufferWrite(a,b,c)           SPI_FLASH_BufferWriteBy(a,b,c,(pWriteFunction)QSPI_FLASH_QuadPageWrite);
00151 #define QSPI_FLASH_BufferWriteByDMA(a,b,c)      SPI_FLASH_BufferWriteBy(a,b,c,(pWriteFunction)QSPI_FLASH_QuadPageWriteByDMA);
00152 #endif
00153 #define SPI_FLASH_BufferWrite(a,b,c)            SPI_FLASH_BufferWriteBy(a,b,c,(pWriteFunction)SPI_FLASH_PageWrite);
00154 #define SPI_FLASH_BufferWriteByDMA(a,b,c)       SPI_FLASH_BufferWriteBy(a,b,c,(pWriteFunction)SPI_FLASH_PageWriteByDMA);
